hero.name: Shohista
hero.description: 8+ years of experience teaching English with 2000+ students taught and 90% certification success rate. Founder of Express Education Center.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Certified English Teacher with 8+ years of experience. Founder of Express Education Center and currently teaching at Unione International School.
about.whoIAmText: I'm a passionate English teacher with over 8 years of professional experience in language education. I specialize in IELTS preparation, CEFR level courses, General English, and Business English. My teaching approach combines modern methodologies with personalized attention to help each student achieve their language goals. With a 90% certification success rate and over 2000 students taught, I am committed to delivering excellence in English education.
about.experience1Description: Founded and lead a successful English education center. Developing curriculum, training teachers, and personally teaching advanced IELTS preparation courses with consistently high student success rates.
about.experience2Description: Teaching English across multiple levels following international standards. Implementing innovative teaching methods and preparing students for international certifications.
about.experience3Description: Developed foundational teaching skills while working with students of all ages and levels. Gained expertise in IELTS preparation and General English courses.
about.experience4Description: Continuously improving teaching methodologies through professional development courses, IELTS examiner training, and staying updated with the latest trends in English language education.

testimonials.title: Student Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: What my students say about their learning journey
testimonials.quote1: The IELTS preparation course was excellent! I achieved my target score thanks to the structured approach and personalized feedback.
testimonials.quote2: My English improved dramatically. The teaching method is engaging and effective for real-world communication.
testimonials.quote3: Best English teacher I've ever had! The lessons are well-organized and the feedback is invaluable.
testimonials.quote4: The Business English course helped me advance in my career. Highly recommended for professionals!
